Asụsụ Fanji, Chuufiè (chufieʼ), bụ zi asụsụ Grassfields Bantu na asụsụ ndị Bafanji na mpaghara Northwest nke Cameroon
E nwere ihe dịka ndị ọkà okwu 17,000
Asụsụ ahụ nwere usoro dị mma nke ọdịdị ụda, gụnyere reduplication na-agụnye adjectives.
Ndị na-asụ Bafanji, o ndị ọnụ ọgụgụ ha dị 8,500, na-akpọ asụsụ ha Chuufi
A na-asụ ya n'ebe ndịda Ndop na Ngalaba Ngoketunjia, Northwest Region
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Bamali, Mengambo, na Bambalang.
